channel.title: metasploit on dronesec
channel.description: Recent content in metasploit on dronesec

item.title: meterpreter shell upgrades using powershell
item.description: One of my primary goals during development of clusterd was ensuring reliability and covertness during remote deploys. It’s no secret that antivirus routinely eats vanilla meterpreter shells. For this, the --gen-payload flag generates a war file with java/jsp_shell_reverse_tcp tucked inside. This is used due to it being largely undetected by AV, and our environments are perfectly suited for it. However, Meterpreter is a fantastic piece of software, and it’d be nice to be able to elevate from this simple JSP shell into it.
